experience.name: NYU Wireless
summary: Working on foundations of Task-Oriented Multi-Terminal compression problems (with Prof. Elza Erkip.)
highlights: One-shot characterization for compression with side information of uniform sources (ISIT 2024).
Robust Multiterminal Neural Compressors (ISIT 2024, Learn to Compress Workshop).
Single-shot bounds for a Source Coding problem with multiple objectives. (Allerton 2023).

experience.name: Bogazici University
summary: Studied Physical Layer based spoofing detection schemes (with Prof. Ali Emre Pusane
highlights: Worked on a Channel State Information based Physical Layer Authentication scheme for an autoregressive channel model (TSP 2020).

experience.name: Max Planck Institute for Intelligent Systems
summary: Design and actuation of MRI-driven small-scale robots towards medical applications.
highlights: Performed Experiments on actuation and localization of ferromagnetic micro robots in MRI systems.
Developed localization algorithm to detect and track artifacts caused by ferromagnetic particles is MRI images.
